question: who has written the most papers on semantic parsing since 2005 ?
query: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT(t4.paperid), t3.authorid FROM paperkeyphrase AS t1 JOIN keyphrase AS t2 ON t1.keyphraseid = t2.keyphraseid JOIN paper AS t4 ON t4.paperid = t1.paperid JOIN writes AS t3 ON t3.paperid = t4.paperid WHERE t2.keyphrasename = 'semantic parsing' AND t4.year > 2005 GROUP BY t3.authorid ORDER BY COUNT(t4.paperid) DESC NULLS LAST
